summary:
*Buffy is studying in the library while TJ sits across from her with his head on the table, fast asleep*
*All of a sudden TJ's...
body:
*Buffy is studying in the library while TJ sits across from her with his head on the table, fast asleep*

*All of a sudden TJ’s head shots up and he begins to look hurriedly around the room at high alert*

Buffy: Uh … What’s up with you?

TJ: My Cyrus senses are tingling.

Buffy: You’re what??

TJ: I can feel him coming. He’s on his way. I can sense him walking down the hallway right now.

Buffy: Uh–

TJ: He’s going around that corner near the water fountain … He’s passing Jonah’s locker …

Buffy: *looking around for someone, anyone, to save her from the lunatic in front of her*

TJ: And now he’s entering the library and should be approaching us in three … tw–

Buffy: Okay, give it up, Kippen. You can’t seriously expect me to believe you’re some kind of Cyrus psychic and can somehow predict his every mov–

Cyrus: Hey guys!

TJ: Hey Cyrus! What an unexpected surprise!

Buffy:

Buffy, shaking her head and returning to her work: Why do I even bother …

summary:
Okay one more for tonight because you guys begged me for it. You're welcome.
Cyrus avoids TJ anytime he sees him in school. He...
body:
Okay one more for tonight because you guys begged me for it. You’re welcome.

Cyrus avoids TJ anytime he sees him in school. He swerves into another hallway or hides behind his locker door or rushes to the bathroom. TJ notices but never follows him, he’s pretty sure he won’t be forgiven this time around, and he doesn’t want to hurt Cyrus anymore than he already has. What he doesn’t know is that he hurts Cyrus more by not coming to explain himself.

summary: Prompt: Tyrus and puppies. Idc about context. Maybe a puppy just follows TJ around everywhere and Cyrus wants to adopt it but...
question: Prompt: Tyrus and puppies. Idc about context. Maybe a puppy just follows TJ around everywhere and Cyrus wants to adopt it but it's very firmly set on going home With TJ. Maybe every time Cyrus is even mildly upset or sad, TJ takes him to a dog park to play with puppies, or just straight up adopts a puppy for him. Maybe they're both mauled by puppies and can't even be upset about it cause cuteness. I'm not picky. Anything, really. We just all need some cuteness right now.

summary: Cyrus goes to Bubbe Rose's burial ground after costume day because he just isn't ready to share the heartbreak he feels with his...
body:
Cyrus goes to Bubbe Rose’s burial ground after costume day because he just isn’t ready to share the heartbreak he feels with his parents yet. He’s scared to. He breaks down when he reaches her gravestone and tells her how his heart feels like it’s being thrown around again and again. And again. And again. Her spirit listens and smiles down at the naive boy.

@captainkippen you’re making me write Bubbe Rose’s spirit now. Please just give up. I am superior.

summary: so, i’ve been reading @captainkippen and @theobligatedklutz angst post wars, and it got me thinking of some and then i was...
body:
so, i’ve been reading @captainkippen and @theobligatedklutz angst post wars, and it got me thinking of some and then i was like, ‘well, everytime TJ or Cyrus see Kira they get really sad’ and THEN my brain went ‘what if TJ is scared Kira will out him, so he let’s her on the team, but he get’s so sad seeing her, that he quits the basketball team. then, Kira becomes the captain and that was her plan all along, she has a team and Buffy has a team’ 

why brain?

summary: When Jonah told Cyrus that "[he] didn't want [them] to look like a couple of dorks" when it came to matching jackets, Cyrus...
body: When Jonah told Cyrus that “[he] didn’t want [them] to look like a couple of dorks” when it came to matching jackets, Cyrus subconsciously decided that boys didn’t like that sort of thing. So when TJ actually wanted to do matching costumes, Cyrus decided that maybe not all guys were like that. But then TJ bailed just like Jonah…

summary: My boyfriend and I are very different drunks, in that the surest sign that my boyfriend is drunk is that he becomes incredibly...
body:
My boyfriend and I are very different drunks, in that the surest sign that my boyfriend is drunk is that he becomes incredibly defensive if someone accuses him of being intoxicated—meanwhile I will happily tell anyone I come accross that I’m drunk so that they understand why I’m doing what I’m doing.

Anyway, that’s exactly how I see drunk!Tyrus

TJ is my boyfriend

Cyrus is me

summary: what would be your personal ranking of the characters? (you can make ties)
question: what would be your personal ranking of the characters? (you can make ties)
answer:
As of right now?

1. Cyrus

2. TJ

3. Bex

4. Andi

5. Buffy

6. Amber

7. Jonah

8. Cece

9. Bowie

10. Marty

i’m not including any of the smaller recurring characters bc most of them never really got the chance to show any development, etc. also jonah and amber both have the potential to rise based on whether their storylines get satisfying endings, etc. also i feel bad having cece so low on the list so i apologize about that i love her.

summary: Do you think Andi Mack could move to ABC considering that Disney owns them?
question: Do you think Andi Mack could move to ABC considering that Disney owns them?
answer:
In theory, yes it would be possible - but it would never happen. Andi Mack doesn’t fit into ABC’s target demographic. Some Disney Channel-esque shows have aired on ABC in the past, most notably Boy Meets World or cartoons such as Recess during their old Saturday Morning block. But since ABC Family was launched in 2001 (as well as the rebranding of Disney Channel around that time), the main ABC network has tried to refocus their audience on adults (and sometimes families). Andi Mack is still a children’s show, and there likely would not be any room for it on a network like ABC. The show was literally created to try to fill the gap that was left for the tween/teen market when ABC Family rebranded as Freeform and changed its target demographic to adults as well. That gap is still there, it’s just up to Disney whether or not they want to keep being the ones to fill it. Switching to ABC also would not help the show’s ratings. Just because ABC gets more viewers, doesn’t mean their largely adult audience would have a positive response to the series. 

Disney+ is their way of combining the audiences of all of their networks and demographics. They’ve got original material in the works that will appeal to the ABC audiences as well as the Disney Chanel audiences. Live I’ve said, the streaming service is our best bet if they decide to not continue the show on the traditional network.

Live I’ve said, the streaming service is our best bet if they decide to not continue the show on the traditional network.
